summary: Stefano Pelloni is an Italian highwaymen known as Il Passatore, loved by women but despised by lawmen. Together with his two man band he always manages to escape the law and head back to ... See full summary »
cast: George Hilton|Edwige Fenech|Manuel Zarzo|Sal Borgese|Chris Avram|Cris Huerta|Jack Logan|Helga Liné|Lucretia Love|Umberto D'Orsi|Marco Migliozzi|Dante Maggio|Fortunato Arena|Dante Cleri|Alessandro Perrella|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Mario Gigantini|Giuseppe Terranova|Ettore Bevilacqua|Ruggero Rosi|Elio Angelucci|Dorian Bettancini|Dario Cavalcanti|Carmen Martínez Sierra|Renzo Pevarello|Claudio Ruffini|Pietro Torrisi
title: Un Casanova en apuros
